content:
**A new DAO NFT project!**

💛💛GIVEAWAYS🧡🧡 **$220 everyday!**

To enter:
1️⃣ Join our Discord server:  https://discord.gg/KSSMUkeY8f
2️⃣ Follow us on Twitter:  https://twitter.com/Doji_NFT
3️⃣ Say hello in the General channel (1 message = 1 entry)

The more you talk the higher chance you will win.

Our Giveaway Winner is selected and announced every 24H!

https://cdn.doji.dev/giveaway-2.gif
